live_updates: Our teams have resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience!
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
47180.summary: Some customers in the Gold Bar and Fulton Place area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
47180.title: Feb 26 - Edmonton (Gold Bar and Fulton Place) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
